#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
double dp[3500000];


int main(){
	int T,R;
	long long mx,N;
	double P; 
	cin>>N>>P>>T>>R;
	mx=min(N,2000000LL);
	//printf("%lld\n",mx);
	for(int i=(int)mx;i>=1;i--){
		dp[i]+=(double)pow(i,-P)*((double)1+dp[i+T+R]);
		dp[i]+=((double)1-(double)pow(i,-P))*dp[i+T];
	}
	printf("%.6lf\n",dp[1]);
	return 0;
}
